verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> set <WH7760> your face <WH6440> toward Gog, <WH1463> of the land <WH776> of Magog, <WH4031> the prince <WH5387> of Rosh, <WH7218> Meshech, <WH4902> and Tubal, <WH8422> and prophesy against him, <WH5012>
and say, <WH559> Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> Behold, <WH1463> I am against you, Gog, prince <WH7218> of Rosh, <WH7218> Meshech, <WH4902> and Tubal: <WH8422>

and I will turn you around, <WH7725> and put <WH5414> hooks <WH2397> into your jaws, <WH3895> and I will bring you forth, <WH3318> with all your army, <WH2428> horses <WH5483> and horsemen, <WH6571> all of them clothed <WH3847> in full <WH4358> armor, <WH7227> a great company <WH6951> with buckler <WH6793> and shield, <WH4043> all of them handling <WH8610> swords; <WH2719>
Persia, <WH6539> Cush, <WH3568> and Put <WH6316> with them, <WH4043> all of them with shield and helmet; <WH3553>

Gomer, <WH1586> and all his hordes; <WH102> the house <WH1004> of Togarmah <WH8425> in the uttermost parts <WH3411> of the north, <WH6828> and all his hordes; <WH102> even many <WH7227> peoples with you. <WH5971>
Be prepared, <WH3559> yes, <WH3559> prepare yourself, <WH6951> you, and all your companies who are assembled <WH6950> to you, <WH4929> and be a guard to them.

After many <WH7227> days <WH3117> you shall be visited: <WH6485> in the latter <WH319> years <WH8141> you shall come <WH935> into the land <WH776> that is brought back <WH7725> from the sword, <WH2719> that is gathered <WH6908> out of many <WH7227> peoples, <WH5971> on the mountains <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> which have been a continual <WH8548> waste; <WH2723> but it is brought forth <WH3318> out of the peoples, <WH5971> and they shall dwell <WH3427> securely, <WH983> all of them.

You shall ascend, <WH5927> you shall come <WH935> like a storm, <WH7722> you shall be like a cloud <WH6051> to cover <WH3680> the land, <WH776> you, <WH102> and all your hordes, and many <WH7227> peoples with you. <WH5971>

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> It shall happen in that day, <WH3117> that things <WH1697> shall come <WH5927> into your mind, <WH3824> and you shall devise <WH2803> an evil <WH7451> device: <WH4284>

and you shall say, <WH559> I will go up <WH5927> to the land <WH776> of unwalled villages; <WH6519> I will go <WH935> to those who are at rest, <WH8252> who dwell <WH3427> securely, <WH983> all of them dwelling <WH3427> without walls, <WH2346> and having neither bars <WH1280> nor gates; <WH1817>

to take <WH7997> the spoil <WH7998> and to take <WH962> the prey; <WH957> to turn <WH7725> your hand <WH3027> against the waste places <WH2723> that are now inhabited, <WH3427> and against the people <WH5971> who are gathered <WH622> out of the nations, <WH1471> who have gotten <WH6213> livestock <WH4735> and goods, <WH7075> who dwell <WH3427> in the middle <WH2872> of the earth. <WH776>

Sheba, <WH7614> and Dedan, <WH1719> and the merchants <WH5503> of Tarshish, <WH8659> with all the young lions <WH3715> of it, <WH559> shall tell you, <WH935> Have you come to take <WH7997> the spoil? <WH7998> have you assembled <WH6950> your company <WH6951> to take <WH962> the prey? <WH957> to carry away <WH5375> silver <WH3701> and gold, <WH2091> to take away <WH3947> livestock <WH4735> and goods, <WH7075> to take <WH7997> great <WH1419> spoil? <WH7998>

Therefore, <WH1121> son of man, <WH120> prophesy, <WH5012> and tell <WH559> Gog, <WH1463> Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> In that day <WH3117> when my people <WH5971> Israel <WH3478> dwells <WH3427> securely, <WH983> shall you not know it? <WH3045>

You shall come <WH935> from your place <WH4725> out of the uttermost parts <WH3411> of the north, <WH6828> you, <WH7227> and many peoples <WH5971> with you, <WH7392> all of them riding on horses, <WH5483> a great <WH1419> company <WH6951> and a mighty <WH7227> army; <WH2428>

and you shall come up <WH5927> against my people <WH5971> Israel, <WH3478> as a cloud <WH6051> to cover <WH3680> the land: <WH776> it shall happen in the latter <WH319> days, <WH3117> that I will bring <WH935> you against my land, <WH776> that the nations <WH1471> may know <WH3045> me, <WH6942> when I shall be sanctified in you, <WH1463> Gog, before their eyes. <WH5869>

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> Are you he of whom I spoke <WH1696> in old <WH6931> time <WH3117> by <WH3027> my servants <WH5650> the prophets <WH5030> of Israel, <WH3478> who prophesied <WH5012> in those days <WH3117> for many years <WH8141> that I would bring you against them? <WH935>

It shall happen in that day, <WH3117> when <WH3117> Gog <WH1463> shall come <WH935> against the land <WH127> of Israel, <WH3478> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh, <WH3069> that my wrath <WH2534> shall come up <WH5927> into my nostrils. <WH639>

For in my jealousy <WH7068> and in the fire <WH784> of my wrath <WH5678> have I spoken, <WH1696> Surely in that day <WH3117> there shall be a great <WH1419> shaking <WH7494> in the land <WH127> of Israel; <WH3478>

so that the fish <WH1709> of the sea, <WH3220> and the birds <WH5775> of the sky, <WH8064> and the animals <WH2416> of the field, <WH7704> and all creeping things <WH7431> who creep <WH7430> on the earth, <WH127> and all the men <WH120> who are on the surface <WH6440> of the earth, <WH127> shall shake <WH7493> at my presence, <WH6440> and the mountains <WH2022> shall be thrown down, <WH2040> and the steep places <WH4095> shall fall, <WH5307> and every wall <WH2346> shall fall <WH5307> to the ground. <WH776>

I will call <WH7121> for a sword <WH2719> against him to all my mountains, <WH2022> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> every man <WH376>'s sword <WH2719> shall be against his brother. <WH251>

With pestilence <WH1698> and with blood <WH1818> will I enter into judgment <WH8199> with him; <WH4305> and I will rain on him, <WH102> and on his hordes, and on the many <WH7227> peoples <WH5971> who are with him, <WH7857> an overflowing shower, <WH1653> and great hailstones, <WH417> fire, <WH784> and sulfur. <WH1614>

I will magnify <WH1431> myself, <WH6942> and sanctify myself, <WH3045> and I will make myself known in the eyes <WH5869> of many <WH7227> nations; <WH1471> and they shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh. <WH3068>
